To ensure effect treatment order outcome measure , subject randomize treatment sequence . Healthy male female ( n = 20 ; 35 60 year age ) systolic blood pressure great 120 mm Hg and/or diastolic blood pressure great 80 mm Hg recruit study . Subjects undergo 3 treatment period random order . These treatment period include : A ) 25 g/d soy protein powder ; B ) 50 g/d soy protein powder ; C ) 0 g/d protein powder ( control ) . Each treatment provide 6 week separate 2-week break treatment period . All subject encourage maintain body weight physical activity level study .
